testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "valid" "Donia4@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"............passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "invalid" "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"...........passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.classname: F03_ResetPassword| User could reset his/her password successfully
testcase.name: user could reset password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user select forgot password............................................passed And user enter the email "Donia4@example.com"...............................passed And user click on recover button............................................passed Then email sent message is displayed........................................passed
